unknown_3: Senpai, new events are begun, hurry up to finish them!
Contents_1: Senpai, new events are begun, hurry up to finish them!
Contents_4: 선배님, 새로운 이벤트가 시작되었습니다, 놓치지 말고 참가해보세요!

unknown_3: Senpai, don’t miss your daily mission~
Contents_1: Senpai, don’t miss your daily mission~
Contents_4: 선배! 일일 테스트를 아직 클리어하지 않았어요. 잊지마세요!

unknown_3: Senpai! Come see the new changes on campus!
Contents_1: Senpai! Come see the new changes on campus!
Contents_4: 선배님, 우리 캠퍼스에 변화가 생겼어요!

unknown_3: Senpai, your girls are miss you badly, hurry back!
Contents_1: Senpai, your girls are miss you badly, hurry back!
Contents_4: 선배! 소녀가 선배님을 기다리고 있답니다! 빨리 돌아오세요!

unknown_3: Senpai, your girls cannot fight without you, hurry back~
Contents_1: Senpai, your girls cannot fight without you, hurry back~
Contents_4: 선배가 없으면 소녀들의 전투력이 크게 떨어집니다. 빨리 돌아가서 같이 싸워주세요!

unknown_3: Senpai, campus will be full of devils if you don’t come back!
Contents_1: Senpai, campus will be full of devils if you don’t come back!
Contents_4: 선배, 빨리 돌아오시지 않으면, 학원이 악마에게 점령당하고 말거에요!

unknown_3: Senpai, you truly want to abandon your battle girls?
Contents_1: Senpai, you truly want to abandon your battle girls?
Contents_4: 선배, 돌아오시지 않는 건가요? 소녀들은 언제나 선배를 기다리고 있습니다.

unknown_3: Senpai, you have uninitiated internship task, hurry to finish!
Contents_1: Senpai, you have uninitiated internship task, hurry to finish!
Contents_4: 선배, 아직 완료하지 않은 아르바이트 미션이 있어요! 어서 시작해 보세요!

unknown_3: Senpai! Your team was defeated in campus league! Revenge now!
Contents_1: Senpai, your rank in Campus League is declined, time to check out!
Contents_4: 선배, 학원 리그 팀이 패배했습니다. 어서 복수 해줍시다!

unknown_3: Guild Notice changed: {1}
Contents_1: Guild Notice changed: {1}
Contents_4: 동아리 공지를： {1} 로 변경

unknown_3: Leader! We need your help of building guild! Come back!
Contents_1: Leader! We need your help of building guild! Come back!
Contents_4: 동아리 회장님, 동아리에 문제가 발생했습니다. 빨리 와서 해결해 주세요!

unknown_3: Leader! Our guild can't move on without you! Please come back!
Contents_1: Leader! Our guild can't move on without you! Please come back!
Contents_4: 선배님, 지금 동아리에서 동아리 회장을 필요로 합니다! 빨리 돌아와 주세요!

unknown_3: Leader! Where are you? We have something serous happened in guild!
Contents_1: Leader! Where are you? We have something serous happened in guild!
Contents_4: 회장님이 없는 동안 동아리의 발전이 더딥니다. 빨리 돌아와 주세요!

unknown_3: Leader! Do you really want to leave your guild? Please come back!
Contents_1: Leader! Do you really want to leave your guild? Please come back!
Contents_4: 선배, 동아리원들과 반친구들이 모두 선배를 기다리고 있답니다!

unknown_3: Senpai! How was your first day in campus? Was it great?
Contents_1: Senpai! How was your first day in campus? Was it great?
Contents_4: 선배, 학원생활은 어때요? 잘 지내고 계시죠!

unknown_3: Senpai! Girls were all talking about you these days!
Contents_1: Senpai! Girls were all talking about you these days!
Contents_4: 선배, 소녀들에게 좋은 선배라고 칭찬이 자자하더군요!

unknown_3: Senpai! You and your girls are working harder and harder! Fight!
Contents_1: Senpai! You and your girls are working harder and harder! Fight!
Contents_4: 선배, 소녀들과의 손발이 점점 척척 맞군요! 계속해서 힘내세요!

unknown_3: Senpai! You are the chosen one to help us defeat demons!
Contents_1: Senpai! You are the chosen one to help us defeat demons!
Contents_4: 선배님 덕분에 악마를 쓰러뜨릴 수 있었습니다. 역시 선배님이에요!

unknown_3: Senpai! Many girls are sending your letters! Come and see!
Contents_1: Senpai! Many girls are sending your letters! Come and see!
Contents_4: 선배, 선배를 좋아하는 소녀들이 많아요! 러브레터가 아주 많네요! 모두와 사이좋게 지내 봐요!

unknown_3: Senpai! Please select your orders in Canteen!
Contents_1: Senpai! Please select your orders in Canteen!
Contents_4: 선배, 오늘 음식 주문을 까먹었나 보네요. 빨리 만들어 보세요!

unknown_3: Senpai! You still have boss fight in guild! Come join the fight!
Contents_1: Senpai! You still have boss fight in guild! Come join the fight!
Contents_4: 선배님, 오늘 아직 동아리 퀘스트에 도전하지 않으셨나 보네요. 빨리 참여해 주세요!
